languages.text: {n}Пожилой техношаман поднимает на вас мутный взгляд. От него сильно пахнет машинным выхлопом.{/n} "Вы пришли, чтобы говорить с великим Префом, призраки? Преф не снизойдет до вашей речи. Но я помогу, переведу".

{n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."
languages.original_text: {n}Пожилой техношаман поднимает на вас мутный взгляд. От него сильно пахнет машинным выхлопом.{/n} "Вы пришли, чтобы говорить с великим Префом, призраки? Преф не снизойдет до вашей речи. Но я помогу, переведу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you. His eyes are dim. He smells strongly of machine exhaust.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the great Pref, ghosts? Pref won't stoop to your language. But I can help. I can interpret."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you. His eyes are dim. He smells strongly of machine exhaust.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the great Pref, ghosts? Pref won't stoop to your language. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}高齢の技術祈祷師が視力の落ちた目であなたを見上げる。彼からは排気ガスの臭いがする。{/n}「偉大なプレフと話しに来たのか、亡霊よ。あなたの低級な言葉をプレフは話さないが、私が力になれる。通訳しよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}高齢の技術祈祷師が視力の落ちた目であなたを見上げる。彼からは排気ガスの臭いがする。{/n}「偉大なプレフと話しに来たのか、亡霊よ。あなたの低級な言葉をプレフは話さないが、私が力になれる。通訳しよう」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}这位年迈的技术萨满用浑浊的眼睛看着你，他身上有一股刺鼻的废气味道。{/n}“你们是来与伟大的普雷弗交谈的吗，鬼魂？普雷弗不会说你们那蹩脚的语言，但我可以帮忙解释意思。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位年迈的技术萨满用浑浊的眼睛看着你，他身上有一股刺鼻的废气味道。{/n}“你们是来与伟大的普雷弗交谈的吗，鬼魂？普雷弗不会说你们那蹩脚的语言，但我可以帮忙解释意思。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}D'un âge avancé, le technochaman lève vers vous un regard nébuleux. Il empeste le gaz d'échappement.{/n} « Êtes-vous venus pour parler au grand Pref, fantômes ? Pref ne parle pas votre langage inférieur. Mais je peux vous aider. Je peux interpréter. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un âge avancé, le technochaman lève vers vous un regard nébuleux. Il empeste le gaz d'échappement.{/n} « Êtes-vous venus pour parler au grand Pref, fantômes ? Pref ne parle pas votre langage inférieur. Mais je peux vous aider. Je peux interpréter. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán anciano te observa con los ojos opacos. Desprende un olor fuerte a humo de motor.{/n} «¿Habéis acudido a hablar con el gran Pref, fantasmas? Pref no hablará vuestra lengua menor, pero puedo ayudar a interpretarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnochamán anciano te observa con los ojos opacos. Desprende un olor fuerte a tubo de escape.{/n} «¿Habéis acudido a hablar con el gran Pref, fantasmas? Pref no hablará vuestra lengua menor, pero puedo ayudar a interpretarla».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Der alte Tech-Schamane blickt mit trüben Augen zu dir auf. Er riecht stark nach Abgasen.{/n} "Seid Ihr gekommen, um mit dem großen Präf zu sprechen, Geister? Präf spricht Eure niedere Sprache nicht. Doch ich kann helfen. Ich kann dolmetschen."
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Tech-Schamane blickt mit trüben Augen zu dir auf. Er riecht stark nach Abgasen.{/n} "Seid Ihr gekommen, um mit dem großen Präf zu sprechen, Geister? Präf spricht Eure niedere Sprache nicht. Doch ich kann helfen. Ich kann dolmetschen."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar tekno şaman, sönük gözlerle sana bakıyor. Üzerine keskin bir egzoz dumanı kokusu sinmiş.{/n} "Ulu Pref'le konuşmaya mı geldiniz hayaletler? Pref, sizin alt seviye dilinizi konuşmaz. Ben yardımcı olabilirim. Tercümanlık yapabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly tech-shaman looks up at you with dim eyes. He smells strongly of exhaust fumes.{/n} "Have you come to speak to the Great Pref, ghosts? Pref will not speak your lesser tongue. But I can help. I can interpret."

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar tekno şaman, sönük gözlerle sana bakıyor. Yoğun şekilde egzoz dumanı kokuyor.{/n} "Ulu Pref'le mi konuşmaya geldiniz hayaletler? Pref sizin alt seviye dilinizi konuşmaz ama ben yardımcı olabilirim. Tercümanlık yapabilirim."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
